info.title: Platformatic DB
info.description: Exposing a SQL database as REST

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new user to the database.

put.description: Update one or more user in the database.

get.description: Fetch User using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more user from the Database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

post.description: Add new todo to the database.

put.description: Update one or more todo in the database.

get.description: Fetch Todo using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more todo from the Database.
